sentences.sentence: Our specialization is the exportation of Chinese silk garments.
sentences.translation: 我司专门从事中国丝绸衣服出口。

sentences.sentence: Article 34 No goods that are prohibited from exportation may be exported.
sentences.translation: 第三十四条属于禁止出口的货物，不得出口。

sentences.sentence: Many [3] accused Wal-mart of instigating the exportation of 200, 000 US jobs.
sentences.translation: 单是沃尔玛就被指责输出了20万个美国岗位。
